top_stories.description:
arXiv:2506.06284v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: This paper introduces a framework for representing information about entities that do not exist or may never exist, such as those involving fictional entities, blueprints, simulations, and future scenarios. top_stories.description:
arXiv:2506.06285v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: Evolving Fuzzy Systems (eFS) have gained significant attention due to their ability to adaptively update their structure in response to data dynamics while maintaining interpretability. However, the lack of publicly available implementations of these models limits their accessibility and widespread adoption.
